GRID.name: Student List
GRID.where: (printed = false) AND (finalised = true) AND (studentdeanapproval = true) AND (finaceapproval = true) AND (chaplainapproval = true) AND (majorapproval = true)

FORM.name: Fields
FORM.COMBOLIST: field_type TEXTFIELD DATE TIME LIST SELECT TITLE SUBGRID TABLE TAB

FORM.name: Sub Fields
FORM.COMBOLIST: sub_field_type TEXTFIELD DATE TIME LIST SELECT
